name: Pork with Carrot
description: A delicious combination of fresh ingredients
instructions: Prepare all ingredients by washing and cutting as needed
Heat oil in a large pan over medium heat
Cook protein ingredients first until done
Add vegetables and sauté until tender
Season with salt, pepper, and herbs
Combine all ingredients and heat through
tips: Let beef rest for 5 minutes after cooking for juicier results
Don't wash mushrooms - wipe them clean with a damp paper towel
